item.title: Last.fm’s robots.txt
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: BoingBoing pointed out a hidden nugget at the bottom of Last.fm’s robots.txt. That is an awesome geek easter egg. A little bit of history if you are into that sort of thing.
item.content:encoded:
BoingBoing pointed out a hidden nugget at the bottom of Last.fm’s robots.txt.

That is an awesome geek easter egg. A little bit of history if you are into that sort of thing.

item.title: Movie Review: Robots
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: Robots is a fun movie with a good story. Sarah and Alice both liked it as well. The cast list is impressive, with lots of well known actors lending their voices to the movie. I really only have major problem with story. There are a number of little scenes that are obvious references to very […]
item.content:encoded:
Robots is a fun movie with a good story. Sarah and Alice both liked it as well. The cast list is impressive, with lots of well known actors lending their voices to the movie.

I really only have major problem with story. There are a number of little scenes that are obvious references to very contemporary pop culture references. They were funny enough, but I think they will quickly become dated.

On the positive side, this is a movie that both parents and kids can enjoy.

3.5 out of 5
